description: Do Not Modify. Generated by Event Schema Generator v1.0.15 on 2021-Sep-16 10:18:14

SessionId.description: Units: Count. A lifetime counter incremented on the start of a drive session. This ID uniquely defines a drive session for this telemetry device. The ID may be referenced by other events.

Checklist_FaultResponse.description: Units: BitArray, one bit per question response, 30 questions total. Indicates the responses of the In-Session Checklist. One bit per question response, where Question 1 corresponds to bit zero. Bit value of zero indicates 'OK' response. Bit value of one indicates 'Fault' response.

Checklist_LockoutResponse.description: Units: BitArray, one bit per question response, 30 questions total. Indicates the responses of the Checklist that caused a lock out (prevents truck from starting until technician performs service). One bit per question response, where Question 1 corresponds to bit zero. Bit value of One indicates question response caused lockout.

Checklist_QuestionsAnswered.description: Units: BitArray, one bit per question response, 30 questions total. Indicates which checklist questions were answered. One bit per question response, where Question 1 corresponds to bit zero. Bit value of one indicates question was answered.

ChecklistDuration.description: Units: Seconds. The combined duration of both the pre-start and post-start checklist.

Checklist_NotAllAnswered.description: Units: Boolean. Indicates whether or not all checklist questions were answered. Value of true indicates not all questions were answered.

AssetLockoutOccurred.description: Units: Boolean. Indicates whether or not event triggered Asset / Truck lockout. Value of true indicates event did trigger Asset / Truck lockout, thereby preventing next Asset / Truck start until review from supervisor / service technician.

AssetShutdownOccurred.description: Units: Boolean. Indicates whether or not event triggered Asset / Truck shutdown. Value of true indicates event did trigger Asset / Truck to shutdown.

OperatorId.description: ID of operator currently logged onto the asset / telemetry device.

FacilityCode.description: ID embedded in operator access card, normally referred to as site or facility code. Helps to determine which operator is currently logged onto the asset / telemetry device.
